scripts.dev: pnpm exec --parallel --filter "{apps}^..." -- pnpx ttsc -b tsconfig.build.json && pnpm run dev --parallel --filter {apps}
scripts.test:unit: pnpm exec --parallel --filter "{apps}[$(git rev-parse HEAD)]^..." -- pnpx ttsc -b tsconfig.build.json && pnpm run test:unit --parallel --filter "{apps}[$(git rev-parse HEAD)]"
scripts.test:e2e: pnpm exec --parallel --filter "{apps}[$(git rev-parse HEAD)]^..." -- pnpx ttsc -b tsconfig.build.json && pnpm run test:e2e --parallel --filter "{apps}[$(git rev-parse HEAD)]"
